text: Va az in pes, dar in kitoʙ ʙar sumo nozil kardaem, ki cun sunided, kasone ojoti Xudoro inkor mekunand pa onro ʙa masxara megirand, ʙo onho manisined, to on goh, ki ʙa suxane digar pardozand. Vagarna sumo niz hamonandi onho xohed ʙud. Va Xudo hamai munofiqonu kofironro dar cahannam gird meovarad
